data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Veri kaynaklar覺'
define view entity ykpi_i_data_sources
  as select from    ykpi_t_source  as DataSource
    left outer join ykpi_t_sourcex as Description on  Description.language        = $session.system_language
                                                  and DataSource.main_module      = Description.main_module
                                                  and DataSource.business_process = Description.business_process
                                                  and DataSource.data_source      = Description.data_source
  association        to parent ykpi_i_business_processes as _businessProcesses on  $projection.MainModule      = _businessProcesses.MainModule
                                                                               and $projection.BusinessProcess = _businessProcesses.BusinessProcess
  association [1..1] to ykpi_i_main_modules              as _mainModule        on  $projection.MainModule = _mainModule.MainModule
{
  key DataSource.main_module            as MainModule,
  key DataSource.business_process       as BusinessProcess,
  key DataSource.data_source            as DataSource,
      Description.description           as Description,
      DataSource.created_by_field       as CreatedByField,
      DataSource.create_date_field      as CreateDateField,
      DataSource.additional_filter      as AdditionalFilter,
      DataSource.group_by_fields        as GroupByFields,
      DataSource.data_collection_class  as DataCollectionClass,
      DataSource.data_collection_method as DataCollectionMethod,
      DataSource.lower_limit            as LowerLimit,
      DataSource.upper_limit            as UpperLimit,
      _businessProcesses,
      _mainModule
}
